FuncDef: The cmd recording-scheme command applies a policy in a recording scheme to record the commands executed on the device. The undo cmd recording-scheme command deletes a policy from a recording scheme. By default, the commands that are used on the device are not recorded.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a recording scheme.
The recording scheme must already exist.

ExtraInfo: During the device configuration, incorrect operations may result in network faults. After the cmd recording-scheme command is executed, you can view records of the commands executed on the device to locate the network faults.
